==================== 03-10-2018 ====================

==================== 03-04-2018 ====================
* frameworks/base/ ead394f1b67 BatteryService: add turbo power charging support [Sebastian] * hardware/qcom/audio-caf/msm8952/ 7b486fef audio: configs: update policy configuration to fix vts failure [Ethan Chen] f8f9a84e hal: fix failure in running VtsHalAudioV2_0Target module [Ethan Chen] e657be2f mm-audio: aenc: Fix VTS failures for encoders [Ethan Chen] 297e11f3 hal: Fix failure in VtsHalAudioV2_0Target test due to spkr protection [Ethan Chen] f6aa85b3 hal: Update prefixes for audio system properties [Ethan Chen] 1ac3f4ea audio: Fix msm8952-snd-card-mtp support [Ethan Chen] 25111ae1 hal: Clean up compilation warnings [Ethan Chen] c3a1fbf0 hal: Fix voice call recording [Ethan Chen] ab524f1c hal: Support the audio amplifier hook [Ethan Chen] 9b068339 hal: Don't try to record using 3-mic unless we mean it [Ethan Chen] c9f39b71 audio: Extend platform parser to allow device name aliasing [Ethan Chen] f701b2e3 audio: Return ENODATA when position is failed to be retreived [Ethan Chen] a68b3d9a hal: configs: effects: update conf & lib paths [Ethan Chen] 18769b02 hal: audio-test: Move omx tests mm-audio-internal [Ethan Chen] ced45bb2 audio: Only allow non-legacy HAL [Ethan Chen] c338cd60 audio: Use * pathmap [Ethan Chen] * hardware/qcom/audio-caf/msm8998/ 33c6c64d hal: switch audio_extn_set_parameters and amplifier_set_parameters [codeworkx] f19eb03b hal: Support the audio amplifier hook [codeworkx] * hardware/qcom/display-caf/msm8952/ 6e7faf655 Merge remote-tracking branch 'caf/LA.BR.1.3.7_rb1.9' into lineage-15.1-caf-8952 [Ethan Chen] * hardware/qcom/media-caf/msm8952/ 88d4d3adc Merge remote-tracking branch 'caf/LA.BR.1.3.7_rb1.9' into lineage-15.1-caf-8952 [Ethan Chen]

==================== 03-02-2018 ====================
* device/motorola/potter/ 1b289b5 potter: label mmcblk0p35 as metadata_block_device [GtrCraft] * kernel/motorola/msm8953/ 1bb41436efa Linux 3.18.97 [Faiyaz Sheth] 927da6ce539 ASN.1: fix out-of-bounds read when parsing indefinite length item [Faiyaz Sheth] 5cd55b77cb1 usb: gadget: f_fs: Process all descriptors during bind [Faiyaz Sheth] f8dad2eca82 usb: dwc3: gadget: Set maxpacket size for ep0 IN [Faiyaz Sheth] 955446ed68e arm64: Disable unhandled signal log messages by default [Faiyaz Sheth] 33c3ded6c2e irqchip/gic-v3: Use wmb() instead of smb_wmb() in gic_raise_softirq() [Faiyaz Sheth] e0fef557893 x86/oprofile: Fix bogus GCC-8 warning in nmi_setup() [Faiyaz Sheth] 1fe8b17ecdd iio: adis_lib: Initialize trigger before requesting interrupt [Faiyaz Sheth] bf7ee0dd9c3 iio: buffer: check if a buffer has been set up when poll is called [Faiyaz Sheth] 5e2e719d5c5 cfg80211: fix cfg80211_beacon_dup [Faiyaz Sheth] 59096371464 scsi: ibmvfc: fix misdefined reserved field in ibmvfc_fcp_rsp_info [Faiyaz Sheth] 1543686e657 PCI: keystone: Fix interrupt-controller-node lookup [Faiyaz Sheth] cfb35de38ad netfilter: drop outermost socket lock in getsockopt() [Faiyaz Sheth] 11047a417be Linux 3.18.96 [Faiyaz Sheth] f701e8ae5e5 crypto: s5p-sss - Fix kernel Oops in AES-ECB mode [Faiyaz Sheth] 0ecbeae1e11 KVM: async_pf: Fix #DF due to inject "Page not Present" and "Page Ready" exceptions simultaneously [Faiyaz Sheth] c0aeead987b hippi: Fix a Fix a possible sleep-in-atomic bug in rr_close [Faiyaz Sheth] 906e6f7de35 xen: XEN_ACPI_PROCESSOR is Dom0-only [Faiyaz Sheth] c2a6275a469 x86/mm/kmmio: Fix mmiotrace for page unaligned addresses [Faiyaz Sheth] 55d9126c9a7 mm/early_ioremap: Fix boot hang with earlyprintk=efi,keep [Faiyaz Sheth] 027dfae7442 dmaengine: jz4740: disable/unprepare clk if probe fails [Faiyaz Sheth] 313d6378bca xfrm: Fix stack-out-of-bounds with misconfigured transport mode policies. [Faiyaz Sheth] 672a262ca03 spi: sun4i: disable clocks in the remove function [Faiyaz Sheth] 348dc93c3c4 509: fix printing uninitialized stack memory when OID is empty [Faiyaz Sheth] 5cd216b24da btrfs: Fix possible off-by-one in btrfs_search_path_in_tree [Faiyaz Sheth] fdbeb9b9aab net_sched: red: Avoid illegal values [Faiyaz Sheth] 5807ac52752 net_sched: red: Avoid devision by zero [Faiyaz Sheth] 372151b900a gianfar: fix a flooded alignment reports because of padding issue.
